00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup I2C_Examples I2C
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup I2C_7_bit_mode_master
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 typedef enum {Fail = 0, Pass = !Fail} TestResult;
00048 
00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 #define I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS     0x0A
00051 #define I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS      0x60
00052 #define BufferSize             4
00053 #define ClockSpeed             1000000
00054 
00055 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 void I2C_Configuration(void);
00057 void I2C_Master_Transmitter(void);
00058 void I2C_Master_Receiver(void);
00059 
00060 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00061 
00062 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 u8 I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x1, 0x2, 0x3, 0x4};
00064 u8 I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize] = {0x00};
00065 vu8 Tx_Index = 0;
00066 vu8 Rx_Index = 0;
00067 
00068 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00070   * @brief  Main program.
00071   * @retval None
00072   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00073 int main(void)
00074 {
00075   /* Initialize LED1 & LED2 on HT32 board                                                                   */
00076   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00077   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00078 
00079   I2C_Configuration();                /* I2C configuration                                                  */
00080 
00081   I2C_Master_Transmitter();
00082 
00083   I2C_Master_Receiver();
00084 
00085   while (1);
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00090   * @retval None
00091   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00092 void I2C_Configuration(void)
00093 {
00094   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00095     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00096     HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00097     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO              = 1;
00098     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Configure GPIO to I2C mode for Master                                                                  */
00102   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00103   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00104 
00105   { /* I2C Master configuration                                                                             */
00106 
00107     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00108        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00109        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00110     */
00111     I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00112 
00113     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00114     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00115     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = DISABLE;
00116     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS;
00117     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = ClockSpeed;
00118     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00119     I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00120   }
00121 
00122   /* Enable I2C                                                                                             */
00123   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00127   * @brief  I2C master transfers data to another device.
00128   * @retval None
00129   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00130 void I2C_Master_Transmitter(void)
00131 {
00132   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133   /* Master Transmitter                                                                                     */
00134   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00135   /* Send I2C START & I2C slave address for write                                                           */
00136   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00137 
00138   /* Check on Master Transmitter STA condition and clear it                                                 */
00139   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_SEND_START));
00140 
00141   /* Check on Master Transmitter ADRS condition and clear it                                                */
00142   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_TRANSMITTER_MODE));
00143   /* Send data                                                                                              */
00144   while (Tx_Index < BufferSize)
00145   {
00146     /* Check on Master Transmitter TXDE condition                                                           */
00147     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00148     /* Master Send I2C data                                                                                 */
00149     I2C_SendData(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx[Tx_Index ++]);
00150   }
00151   /* Send I2C STOP condition                                                                                */
00152   I2C_GenerateSTOP(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT);
00153   /*wait for BUSBUSY become idle                                                                            */
00154   while (I2C_ReadRegister(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_REGISTER_SR)&0x80000);
00155   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00159   * @brief  I2C master receives data from another device.
00160   * @retval None
00161   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00162 void I2C_Master_Receiver(void)
00163 {
00164   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00165   /* Master Receiver                                                                                        */
00166   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00167   /* Send I2C START & I2C slave address for read                                                            */
00168   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_READ);
00169 
00170   /* Check on Master Transmitter STA condition and clear it                                                 */
00171   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_SEND_START));
00172 
00173   /* Check on Master Transmitter ADRS condition and clear it                                                */
00174   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE));
00175 
00176   I2C_AckCmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00177   /* Receive data                                                                                           */
00178   while (Rx_Index < BufferSize)
00179   {
00180 
00181     /* Check on Slave Receiver RXDNE condition                                                              */
00182     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY));
00183     /* Store received data on I2C1                                                                          */
00184     I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx[Rx_Index ++] = I2C_ReceiveData(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT);
00185     if (Rx_Index == (BufferSize-1))
00186     {
00187       I2C_AckCmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, DISABLE);
00188     }
00189   }
00190   /* Send I2C STOP condition                                                                                */
00191   I2C_GenerateSTOP(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT);
00192   /*wait for BUSBUSY become idle                                                                            */
00193   while (I2C_ReadRegister(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_REGISTER_SR)&0x80000);
00194 
00195   /* Check on validity of received data on I2Cx                                                             */
00196   if (CmpBuffer(I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx, I2C_Master_Buffer_Tx, BufferSize))
00197   {
00198     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00199   }
00200   else
00201   {
00202     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00203   }
00204 }
00205 
00206 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00207   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00208   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00209   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00210   * @retval None
00211   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00212 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00213 {
00214   while (BufferLength--)
00215   {
00216     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00217     {
00218       return Fail;
00219     }
00220 
00221     Buffer1++;
00222     Buffer2++;
00223   }
00224 
00225   return Pass;
00226 }

00228 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00230   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00231   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00232   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00233   * @retval None
00234   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00235 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00236 {
00237   /*
00238      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00239      Debug message can be added here.
00240      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00241   */
00242 
00243   while (1)
00244   {
00245   }
00246 }
00247 #endif
